p: The Brazilian Federal Council of Nursing (Cofen) recommends that nursing workers belonging to the risk groups avoid working at the front line to fight COVID-19. The reason is that nursing workers are in direct contact with infected individuals, which increases the risk of potential contagion. The situation worsens with the Provisional Measure 927/2020, issued by the President of the Republic, which allows the extension of working hours and the reduction of mandatory rest for these workers ( 24) .
